General.Name: DPSC Limited
General.Description: India Power Corporation Limited, together with its subsidiaries, generates and distributes electricity in India. It operates 24.8 MW of wind assets in Gujarat; 2 MW of solar asset in West Bengal; and thermal power plants of 12 MW in Asansol, West Bengal. The company also has a distribution license of approximately 798 square kilometers in Asansol"Ranigunj area of West Bengal. It serves government, industrial houses, railways, and domestic consumers. The company was formerly known as DPSC Limited and changed its name to India Power Corporation Limited in August 2013. India Power Corporation Limited was incorporated in 1919 and is headquartered in Kolkata, India.
